channel.title: Metadata on mattischrome
channel.description: Recent content in Metadata on mattischrome

item.title: The Orphan Project
item.description: One of the nice features added to this blog in its recent update was the tags page. With the help of this very useful post and some additional CSS tweaks, [the resulting page is something that I am very happy with]. The page lists all of the tags that apply to any post in alphabetical order, along with the number of posts with that tag. It’s mostly intended as a guide for you the reader, to help you see whether your preoccupations match my own.
